ComicInfo.Summary:
Gert is more jaded than ever when she discovers the secret behind the mystery man offering her a mission he doesn't think she can refuse.
Eisner Award-winning writer SKOTTIE YOUNG (MIDDLEWEST, TWIG, THE ME YOU LOVE IN THE DARK) and artist BRETT BEAN (Marvel's Rocket & Groot) continue the triumphant return of I HATE FAIRYLAND!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-07 10:35:57. [CVDB961151] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 04:04:15. [Issue ID 2467522]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Brett B Bean,Erik Larsen,Jim Valentino,Jimmie Robinson,Peach MoMoKo,Skottie Young
